attributes.action: Change the law on the shooting of birds of prey to put the burden of proof on the licensed gun owner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current laws protecting birds of prey are being widely flouted and prosecutions, few as they are, are resulting in minor fines. 
We call for the law to be changed to make gun licenses conditional on continuing responsible behaviour.  Any killing or injury of birds of prey in the wild should lead to the suspension of local licenses until the criminal comes forward and conviction should lead to an invariable custodial sentence.
